plugin.name: ☀️ Daily Journal
plugin.description: Support for daily journalling in NotePlan, including start-of-day template, and end-of-day review questions. Before use it requires some configuration: please see website for details.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark

plugin.commands.name: todayStart
plugin.commands.description: Apply Daily Note Template to Today's Calendar Note (requires configuring)

plugin.commands.name: dayReview
plugin.commands.description: Ask journal questions for an end-of-day review (requires configuring)

plugin.settings.title: Daily Template Title
plugin.settings.description: The name of the template that `/dayStart` and `/todayStart` will use.

plugin.settings.title: Journal Section Heading
plugin.settings.description: The name of an existing markdown heading after which the Journal/Review answers are added - if it doesn't exist, it is added at the end of the note.

plugin.settings.title: Journal Questions
plugin.settings.description: This string includes both the Journal/Review questions and how to layout the answers in the daily note. (NB: can include line breaks.)

plugin.settings.title: List of moods
plugin.settings.description: A comma-separated list of possible moods to select from.
plugin.settings.default: 🤩 Great, 🙂 Good, 😇 Blessed, 🥱 Tired, 😫 Stressed, 😤 Frustrated, 😔 Low, 🥵 Sick, Other
